{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|''dynamic-index-inv''}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|notes={{mark expos}}|
private:
    static constexpr auto /*dynamic-index-inv*/( rank_type i ) noexcept;
}}

Returns the number {{tt|r}} such that in range {{range plain|0|r + 1}} there are exactly {{range plain|0|i + 1}} dynamic extents. If {{c|1=i &lt;= rank_dynamic()}} is {{c/core|false}}, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|the index}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The minimum value of {{tti|r}} such that {{box|{{rlpi|dynamic-index}}{{c/core|1=(r + 1) == i + 1}}}} is {{c/core|true}}.
